answers.answer: You don't say what breed your dog is or the age.  Aside from that, it sounds like your dog is not well and you obviously know this.  There is nothing you can put in the water that is going to help.  Your dog may have a respiratory infection.  Not eating and drinking a lot of water could indicate possible diabetes or kidney problems.You really should get the dog to the Vet for a check up and probable blood work done and I hope you do that soon before he gets any sicker.Good luck..

question: My dog will not eat I have tried different foods such as oatmeal, grits,chicken falvored noodles etc. He is drinking lots of water. his nose is dry ,his eyes have some mucus in them . he sneezes some. He does come out in the sun to sleep during the day.He has a good will not to give up.to me he acts like he has a bad cold. is there anything that I can put in his water that will help him get better?
title: Sick dog
